oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Proceedings of the Second Asian Regional Maize Workshop
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Wedderburn, R.N.
De Leon, C.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: International cooperation
Plant breeding
Zea mays
Research
Asia
Seed production
Production
AMRW
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Second Asian Regional Maize Workshop, held in 1986 at various locations in Indonesia, encouraged participants to compare research approaches, results and products. The proceedings contains a series of country reports on maize production and research, accompanied by an overview of the CIMMYT hybrid program, reports from seed companies, and a summary of field visits and regional research issues in maize breeding
